description: This file defines a React functional component named 'ComponentCard' that displays a preview of a UI component along with actions like copying code snippets. It imports components and utilities such as { Link } from 'react-router-dom' and a copyToClipboard utility function. The component takes an 'item' prop and renders different previews based on the 'item.id'. It also includes interaction handlers for copying JSX or HTML code snippets to the clipboard.

methods.name: onCopy
methods.description: Asynchronous function that copies the specified type (jsx or html) code of the item to clipboard and provides visual feedback by temporarily changing the button text.
